descriptions.app_description: Monitors CDN response times and geo-specific latency issues using the Cloudflare Analytics API.

data.author: Jay Udoye
key_features: Uses Cloudflare Analytics API to check for CDN response time
Alerts user when latency goes above set threshold

settings.label: Cloudflare API Token
settings.description: API token for authenticating with the Cloudflare Analytics API.

settings.label: Cloudflare Account ID
settings.description: Cloudflare account ID for accessing the analytics data.

settings.label: Telex Webhook URL
settings.description: Telex webhook URL for sending latency alerts.

settings.label: Latency Threshold (ms)
settings.description: Latency threshold in milliseconds for triggering alerts.

settings.label: Check Interval (Cron Syntax)
settings.description: Interval for checking latency data (e.g., '0 * * * *' for hourly).
